text: Masango haasingori nzvimbo yakazara mvura yemamangrove chete - anosanganisira mamwe masango akasimba akasara akamira uye akambozadza bani reGangetic.
translated_text:
Shona: Masango haasingori nzvimbo yakazara mvura yemamangrove chete - anosanganisira mamwe masango akasimba akasara akamira uye akambozadza bani reGangetic. 
English: Other: The forests are not just mangrove swamps - they include some of the tallest trees in the world, including the mighty Gangetic.
